tripreview.Title: "it was again excelent"
tripreview.sentence: it was really good experience.
You need to keep a ATM counter inside the wondela.

tripreview.Title: "a good amusement park."
tripreview.sentence: wonderla kochi is around 15 kms away from city, situated at pallikkara.
it is a nice and clean amusement park.
they have really good rides and you can enjoy their pool as well.
they have artificial waves and got good ambience.
kids will love this place.

tripreview.Title: "Great place"
tripreview.sentence: Beautiful and great place to visit.
It is a nice place in kochi to be in for a full day.
Rides are Exciting, specially for children.
Take a day break and visit, you will enjoy a lot.

tripreview.Title: "Good fun for the Child in you"
tripreview.sentence: The rides are good.
The water in the pools were not warm.
There are good food joints too.

tripreview.Title: "Good"
tripreview.sentence: A good amusement park.
Clean but crowded.
The facilities are good enough.
There are many food stalls too.

tripreview.Title: "Fun"
tripreview.sentence: A good place to relax and be out of the daily routine work life.
Excellent to visit with family and friends.

tripreview.Title: "excellent park with great rides"
tripreview.sentence: you wont get such a great numbers of quality rides in such a low rates.
really well managed great amusement park with tons of rides for kids and adult.

tripreview.Title: "One of the best amusement park in kerala"
tripreview.sentence: It is one of the best place to visit in kochi.
You can spend a full day of entertainment here.

tripreview.Title: "Average water theme park"
tripreview.sentence: Its definitely loved by most locals though for someone who has been to the likes of disneyland etc this might come across as average.

tripreview.Title: "Take off!"
tripreview.sentence: With its serene location, this water park is a perfect getaway for some adventurous rides.
Be prepared that you will be tired at day end, and I would recommend not to plan any driving/travel overnight.
Make a two day trip to Kochi, spend day one here and the next day chilling out around the city, known for its beaches and backwaters.

tripreview.Title: "Exhaustive but worth trying"
tripreview.sentence: It is the best water theme park around.
Go for the water theme rides which is refreshing given the weather of Kerala.
Cool off in style and fun.

tripreview.Title: "Wonderful place to spend your whole day"
tripreview.sentence: Its among the best amusement park i have visited.
It has all sorts of water rides and the best part is fast track tickets.
You dont have to stand in the queue for the rides.
As i went on a weekend so there was quite a rush and fast track ticket helped me saving my time.

tripreview.Title: "must to see in kochi"
tripreview.sentence: must to see in kochi, family entertainment, kids love this place.
both dry areas and water theme were too good.
much clean environment.

tripreview.Title: "Awesome rides"
tripreview.sentence: The high thrill rides are excellent especially the "Twist Monster".
I wouldn't recommend this ride for weak hearts.
Other rides are very good and the build quality looks strong and boosts confidence about safety of the rides.
The entrance fee is Rs 580 per head but we upgraded to Fast track ticket to escape the queues filled with school and college students.

tripreview.Title: "Family trip"
tripreview.sentence: The safety and hygiene is good.
Went there during a summer holiday.
the crowd level was too high.
so i had to skip some rides

tripreview.Title: "A pure entertainer"
tripreview.sentence: One of the best amusement parks in the country.
A wide variety of games particularly water games on offer.
Not very expensive either.
Excellent for excursions for friends and family.

tripreview.Title: "value for money and great service"
tripreview.sentence: wonder la kochi is like a trip to wonderland for the kids and family alike.
They have rides and activities for all age groups from kids to grandparents.
Most of these amusement parks charge you a premium on the mrp for food etc however wonderla is in a differnt league where they charge you on mrp and also option for food is good.
The rides are best in class and fun especially if you are with a group of friends or family.
The water rides are good but walking from one to the other makes you tired.

my advice is do the water rides first as that is where you have the most of rush as the day progresses and then post lunch go for the dry rides as by then the crowd would have shifted to waterrides and you can avoid long queues.
FYI the dry rides open 1 hour before the water rides which makes most guests go for them and long queues.
Another aspect worth mentioning is the very friendly and helpful attitude of the staff.

tripreview.Title: "Full of fun"
tripreview.sentence: Situated about an hour and a half drive from Kochi, this is a Western style water-park, full of rides and places to swim.
The standards are kept high - it is very clean, all the rides appear safe and secure, and the queues are short.
My only criticism might be that the main lunchtime food outlet by the pool is pretty limited.
The restaurants situated just as you enter the complex have far more choice.
Theres plenty for small children, teenagers and adults to do and the 3D cinema is great fun.
A great day for all the family!

tripreview.Title: "Wonderful WONDERLA !"
tripreview.sentence: Visited the Wonderla Amusement Park, Kerala, in July 2014 with the family.
They have a variety of attractions that suit almost all ages.
It is well maintained with very friendly and helpful staff.
What particularly impressed me was the high standard they demonstrated for safety.
Thoroughly enjoyed the couple of visits there, and planning an annual visit.
Highly recommended.

tripreview.Title: "Excellent theme park"
tripreview.sentence: Been here recently with family.
Had a great time with kids.
Well organized theme park, clean, safe and well maintained fun rides.
Theme park employees are present at all places to guide you.
In water pools, safety is taken care well by the employees.
Arrangement to take automatic photos of high thrill rides by the park is a good feature.
Overall a happy and satisfying experience for the amount spent.

tripreview.Title: "green waterpark but too crowded"
tripreview.sentence: A good place to go with kids.
Water park is good with lots of trees surrounding the place its comfortable even in sunny afternoon.
Althought the place gets very crowded so one has to line up for the rides.
They have a wait free entry ticket at double the cost.
Not worth it though as the rides are limited.

tripreview.Title: "long lines"
tripreview.sentence: if you go there for your child, get the express ticket, its double the price but well worth it as lines are very long.
As westerners this was a bit intense for us, as everyone swims with their cloths on, and there was a lot of people.

tripreview.Title: "Awesome water park"
tripreview.sentence: This is a nice place to hang out.
I bought an fasttrack ticket to overide the queue which was actually good decision.
The land amusements are average, many thrill ones were not working that day.
But the water park is truely amazing and i had the best time ever.
The restaurants inside are also economical.
Good place for a family day out.

tripreview.Title: "awesome rides - best amusement park in india"
tripreview.sentence: WonderLa - A must visit if traveling to Kochi.
It is the best place in Kochi for family or single or with friends.
To enjoy the park fully, take a full day out and reach by 11 AM.
We made sure that we took fast track tickets, its a good way the park has introduced for people who want to avoid the queues by paying double the entry fee.
The land amusements were splendid and very systematic; the water rides were clean, hygienic and superb.
The food is clean, wholesome, fresh and affordable.
There are rides for all age group with separate rides for female and children.
Even the water rides have separate sections for female and families.
Keep it up team Wonderla.

tripreview.Title: "could be better"
tripreview.sentence: The 3d, Xd shows were pathetic, there were some cool and ball shaking rides, water park needs to improve a lot.
In total not a value for money unless u r going with a family.

tripreview.Title: "Super awesome rides, cleanliness, discipline = Wonderla Kochi!!!"
tripreview.sentence: I was here on the 1st of Jan 2015, on New Year's Day.
We were five and we made sure that we took Fast Track tickets, its a good way the park has introduced for people who want to avoid the queues by paying double the entry fee.
The land amusements were splendid, and the water rides were superb.
I'd say, I played almost all the rides and games by buying the fast track tickets.
So make sure you buy them if you can afford it, its really worth it.
For lunch: I'd suggest the "Wood House" in the land amusements area.
The had the "fish combo meal" which had kerala style cooked fish fry, curries and rice.
Very tasty!
If you wish not to miss any of the rides, then make sure you get to the park by 11am.
I did, and I enjoyed to the max.
Keep it up team Wonderla, we hope to come back soon.

tripreview.Title: "Toooooo Goooood, awesome amusement park"
tripreview.sentence: The day before we left Kochi, was staying a nearby hotel from kochi airport.
We have planned to visit Wonderla.
We visit and experienced 4 hours of unlimited happiness.
Don't miss it.
We have just took dry rides but if you want to experience water rides you have to go there with more time in your hand.
Very systematic, clean, hygienic.
Foods are affordable inside the park.
Stuffs are very good.

tripreview.Title: "Best place to be in kochi"
tripreview.sentence: A must visit if travelling to Kochi.
It is the best place in Kochi for family or single or with friends.
Rides for all age group with female n kids separate rides.
Take a full day out n reach by 11 am take express entry ticket(double cost but worth it if travelling with children) to avoid long queues.
Amusement and water park in one place.
It's better than other south east asian countries amusement park.
Neat and clean environment.
Thrill for every age group.

tripreview.Title: "Worth enough and totally value for money."
tripreview.sentence: Previously it is called as Veegland now it is wonderla.
This is place is mainly for youth and middle age.
20% discount is available for student groups and for accompanying faculty it is free.
There are two different types of tickets fast track and normal, fast track tickets totally save the time and double the cost.
Quality and tasty restaurant is inside wonderla at very reasonable prices like below 100 Rupees.
Total maintenance of this theme park is very good.
Toilets and bathrooms are available at everywhere through out the theme park.
You can avail the facilities like locker rooms, dress change rooms and cash watch.
Massage chairs are special attraction after completion of total theme park.
Try to know about some ride priorly to avoid as per your health.

The main thing about this wonder la is a lot of and wonderful rides including artificial ocean and rain dances are available inside this park which is the best thing when compared to all other theme parks in India.

tripreview.Title: "Best park but MUST have express tickets......"
tripreview.sentence: its a great park with lots of fun filled activity,rides ,water fun rides.
i think it is for all age group.
1st i suggest you must have express ticket which differences you with a different row for the ride and you don't have to wait or come in Queue or else its a boring day.
you must carry your swimsuit.
they don't provide or rent them or else you can purchase the cloth from outside stores.
security is very tight in the park.
the park guys are able to make the stags out from the ladies or families.
plan your trip for full one day.
For your convenience you can hire a wrist band for auto payment.
you dont need to carry currency notes in the park.
its a prepaid system and you just show the band, what ever services you take in the park.

tripreview.Title: "good experience"
tripreview.sentence: Visited this place onseptember, there was much crowd, but enjoyed the rides .
there was long queue and security personals are careless.
lot of students (local) getting to ride without queue and if asked they trying to make fight.
so that must need to stop.
For the Staff and management in Wonderla this is a very small issue, but for all those coming from long distance, this is a very big issue.
Unlike other places, the food was reasonably priced and the quality of food is as good as in any hotel outside.
there were many food courts and we tried almost all.
There was age / height restriction for the riskier rides
so couldn't take some of the water rides
it was refreshing and didn't felt tiresome at all after full day spent here.
As the monsoon has started it was drizzling occasionally and kept the atmosphere wonderful.
There were locker rooms, separate dress changing rooms for gents and ladies, washrooms near the lockers so that we can take a shower after getting wet in the pool
overall nice experience.

tripreview.Title: "This is the best Amusement park."
tripreview.sentence: This is one of best Amusement parks I have visited.
You should not miss the Space Gun and Magic Carpet and the free fall.
The place is so clean and Hygenic
You can spend hours in wave pool.

tripreview.Title: "AWSUM"
tripreview.sentence: great place
every one shuld visit atleast once.

tripreview.Title: "Time does flies"
tripreview.sentence: Weekends are buzzing with travelers from outside Kerala as well.
You get discounts for senior citizens.
Rides are excellent.
The waiting time needs to be reviewed.

tripreview.Title: "excellent amusement park in india"
tripreview.sentence: this is one the best i have visited in india, perhaps of any international standard.
plenty of pools and rides.
though most of them were restricted for young children.
plenty of food area all over.
a day is not enough to have fun.
i guess were there on a peak period and lots and lots of crowd was there and it took plenty of time to go thru a ride.
any way a must ,if u r travelling with children.
though it is pretty far from the city

tripreview.Title: "WONDER aT WONDERLA"
tripreview.sentence: Amazing water amusement park, the rides twin flip monster, wave pool and space gun are mind blowing.
Must Try the wonder at wonderla.

tripreview.Title: "Ooh la la...Wonderla"
tripreview.sentence: Visited this place on Diwali day, but surprisingly there was not much crowd, so we could enjoy the rides without long queues and waiting time.
Laser and Water show is a must watch.
Rain dance was amazing.
Unlike other places, the food was reasonably priced and the quality of food is as good as in any hotel outside.
there were many food courts and we tried the wood house.
There was age/ height restriction for the riskier rides
it was refreshing and didn't felt tiresome at all after full day spent here.
As the monsoon has started it was drizzling occasionally and kept the atmosphere wonderful.
There were locker rooms, separate dress changing rooms for gents and ladies, washrooms near the lockers so that we can take a shower after getting wet in the pool
overall nice experience
will plan to visit the wonderla in bangalore too

tripreview.Title: "Good time pass"
tripreview.sentence: Costly to be amused but time will go and we will forget the cost.
The water is clean.
Please finish all the other rides and go for water rides and those stuffs because if you're wet they wouldn't allow other rides.

tripreview.Title: "Ladies Beware"
tripreview.sentence: Hi All, The park is a great place, but the security and staff behavior is pathetic.
Its a great place to spend a vacation, but as far as Privacy is concerned, its the WORST place.

tripreview.Title: "must visit"
tripreview.sentence: must visit this park, Good atmosphere
must visit
if you want to plan a trip to wonderla in holidays, must ensure the ticket.

tripreview.Title: "one of the best park"
tripreview.sentence: Lots of rides, and things to do at attractive prices.
Great place to spend a day.
The attractions are many and thankfully we did not have a lot of tail, since August 19 in addition to being festive, Indian schools have already 'started their activities'.
Hilarious are te water rides, and the artificial wave pool.

tripreview.Title: "Best in kerala"
tripreview.sentence: The best amusement park in kerala.
It has all sorts of rides for everyone in family.

tripreview.Title: "must visit"
tripreview.sentence: I used to go often with friends, relatives, families.
nice place.
clean atmosphere.
safe water rides.
enjoyable moments.
i surely recommend this to all.

funny moments.
go and enjoy.

tripreview.sentence: Good atmosphere and service

tripreview.Title: "Very well maintained, nice water park"
tripreview.sentence: Great rides, good fun for the whole family.

tripreview.Title: "must visit"
tripreview.sentence: must visit this place We feasted, and spent the day.

tripreview.Title: "very good"
tripreview.sentence: All rides are good, water games are also good to enjoy.

tripreview.Title: "A lot of fun"
tripreview.sentence: We spend one day in this amusement park with our daughter and friends, it was really nice.
A lot of attraction for kids and adults.
The wet part is also pretty clean.
The staff is friendly, food is good too.

tripreview.Title: "A Wonder Full Day Spent at Wonderla"
tripreview.sentence: One of the best place to visit .
It has everything starting from low speed rides to high speed water rides and rain dance.
The pool area is great with wave session.

tripreview.Title: "Good for a fun day...."
tripreview.sentence: Very clean, safe, fun place to be as a family.
Food is okay.
Washrooms are clean
Its very far from main land.

tripreview.Title: "Kochi park - excellent by Indian standards"
tripreview.sentence: Negatives 1.difficult to reach
Very difficult to reach there by public trasport.
Heavy rush during holidays and sundays.
No restriction in number of visitors
Ticket rate is worthy it.
Kept clean
Beautiful location

tripreview.Title: "Good place for picnic........."
tripreview.sentence: I liked the maintenance, facilities, vast number of games (dry and wet).
But, will be rush on weekends.
We have to wait in long cues for the games.
Water should be made little warm to avoid cold attack especially to children.

tripreview.Title: "A bigger one compared to Bangalore"
tripreview.sentence: Overall, this amusement park has more activities than Bangalore one.
Only disappointing thing was, I went with family and in certain activities gender was separated which I didn't like it.

tripreview.Title: "Excitement in the package"
tripreview.sentence: a day at wonderla means a lot.
Going there with a buch of friends or your family members will make you feel like on top of the world.
The ticket rates are a bare minimum in comparison to other world renowned amusement parks.
Here new rides are added after frequent intervals.
Getting there is very easy eventhough its a bit faraway from the city.
The park is on a major bus route and is well connected to the city and suburbs.

tripreview.Title: "Joyful rides"
tripreview.sentence: Provides a very good atmosphere.
Its a very great pleasure providing site of travel .

tripreview.Title: "This is lifetime experience of a Amusement park"
tripreview.sentence: This was our first visit to Wonderla Park in Kochi but I would say we would want to visit again and again whenever visit Kerala.
People should not miss this and should include entire one day to enjoy all the rides here.
Your kids will love it the most.
We cut our trip and gave preference to Wonderla over other city which was initially scheduled for a day.
The rides, rain dance, water riding etc you will never forget in the life, Fee was also minimal and justifiable.
For kids below 2 or 3 feet, there is no fee.

tripreview.Title: "Enjoy the heart out"
tripreview.sentence: Have visited the place many times.
It is good to enjoy with family and friends.
A nice place to hangout for a quick holiday.

tripreview.Title: "Only saw youth enjoying. Valuable time wasted in long queue"
tripreview.sentence: Have to wait long time to attend on ride.
No Preference to families only encouraging youth students.
Good rides are under maintenance
also the road to the facility is under maintenance.

tripreview.Title: "wonderlala"
tripreview.sentence: A good amusement park for kids and adults.
Plenty of rides and neat also.

tripreview.Title: "A day well spent! "
tripreview.sentence: Fabulous rides and efficient management
The Twin Flip Monster ride deserves special mention - it can literally take a lot out of you- so be sure you really want to take it.
The water rides are brilliant and make sure you go for a full day to make sure you have enough time to take enough of them.

tripreview.Title: "Worth every rupee in a super clean environment."
tripreview.sentence: Everything is right about this place.
A great place to spend a day out with family.
Might get a little hot at times, so do not get out of the water.

tripreview.Title: "Good"
tripreview.sentence: Its quite natural that even the old ones will become kids when they go to an Amusement Park.
A good place,but needs more maintainance, esp WATER.

tripreview.Title: "A very good experience. "
tripreview.sentence: I had come from chennai with college friends.
We all found the place very entertaining and well organised.
I had even misplaced my phone here and got it back on spot.
The rides are very thrilling and is highly adventurous.

tripreview.Title: "The BEST Amusement Park"
tripreview.sentence: Hi, we have been to Wonderla last week.
It was just for fun with friends and all of us did enjoy very much.
It's not the first time we visit Wonderla
but everytime we visit there's something new / special which makes it unique experience.

tripreview.Title: "Good to hang out with Friends/Family/Kids"
tripreview.sentence: One of the places where you can go if you are unsure of where to go to have fun.
The crowd has increased and the wait on the rides is a bit too longer than before.
Unlike the other water theme parks the management has managed to keep the water and environment clean.

tripreview.Title: "A refreshing place with a Beautiful landscape"
tripreview.sentence: An amazing place with around 65 rides as of today
All of them clean and managed well
Kids have a separate section and the water rides are just amazing
Restaurants throughout the place and good quality of food
truly a different world of fun and joy for the whole family

tripreview.Title: "Dissolve your tensions in water"
tripreview.sentence: Excellent place to be.
If you feel depressed a visit to wonderla will recharge you.
It is a refreshing experience.
has experienced the same.
Very good place to visit with family.

tripreview.Title: "Wonder laaa"
tripreview.sentence: You will never believe that this is an amusement park in India.
Very hygienic and professionally managed park with breath taking land scape and fun rides.

tripreview.Title: "An Amusement Park Of World Class Standards"
tripreview.sentence: A world class amusement park that beats almost all its competitors in India.
The water rides itself take 1 whole day to have a complete and fun-filled experience.
the safety, security and cleanliness are top of the chart.
Once you enter the premises of Wonderlaa you are transported to a whole new world
almost skimming half the grandeur of Disneyland!
Most ideal for family vacations, school college excursions, etc.

tripreview.Title: "Wonderla /Veegaland the wonderful Land of full fun"
tripreview.sentence: absolutely wondarla park is full of entertainments
60+ rides are there .
i have visited more than 5 times there.
every times more and more rides can find there
full family entertainment guaranteed
The FastTrack tickets will help you to avoid the long Queue.

tripreview.Title: "Wonderla Its a World Of Wonder with Full Enjoyment...."
tripreview.sentence: Wonderla Kochi is an amazing place where we get the full enjoyment of a day with wonders.
It is the Top amusement park in India including many rides both in land and water.
All rides are enjoyable for all peoples and the security of wonderla for all rides is the best in its class
I suggest to all come and enjoy at least one time in Wonderla.
It should be an ever memorable day in our life

tripreview.Title: "Wonderlaa"
tripreview.sentence: Real fun centre with so much rides.
especially thunder fall is great.
we can spent a day with our family in wonderlaa and have a fun in wonderlaa.
really kids will enjoy these also.

tripreview.Title: "woww"
tripreview.sentence: an amazing water theme park.
soo many riders, good entertainment.
really super.
We could spend the full day there.
an excellent place for kidz and families.

tripreview.Title: "Spend a Fun-day @ Wonderla"
tripreview.sentence: Spend a Fun-day at this place, its worth.
Most important part I like is the way they organize the things with the international standard.
Enough facility for locker and changing rooms, restaurants and wash rooms.
Neat and clean everywhere, Virtual rides are just OK, still need to improve when you compare with other parks across the world.
I went during the vacation and it was so crowded and had for some time to buy the ticket.
So if you are visiting during vacation , then its better to buy online ticket.
Overall a great place to spend a day.

tripreview.Title: "Clean entertainment"
tripreview.sentence: I have been to Wonderla Kochi multiple times.
Apart from the rides, what impressed me was the cleanliness.
Rides and the water parks were very good.
Food was usual stuff.
it is a better idea to go in the reverse order - go to water first and go to the rides by early afternoon.
Crowd usually follow the other way.

tripreview.Title: "Worth Spending A Day"
tripreview.sentence: We visited this park on 27th May 2014.
Reached the park at 11 am.
Crowded ticket counters with long queue.
A supervisor suggested to go for the fast track tickets through a special counter which is twice the cost of the regular tickets.
No waiting in the queue.
Rides and are well maintained.
Friendly ride assistance is a plus point, particularly, the male staffs.
Water rides are fun.
Locker facility and change rooms are available that are welll maintained and organized.
Only disappointment is food.
Be prepared to survive with sancks and juice the whole day.
Food taste is not up to the mark, but, please note hygiene is good.
No variety in the restaurant food and all the rice preparations did not taste good.
One exclusive vegetarian restaurant is available in the park.
This is a good attempt by the management as generally I view Kerala state is insensitive to towards vegetarian.
Overall it all about fun and enjoyment.

tripreview.Title: "Amazing and Wonderful Wonderla"
tripreview.sentence: i was here with my team once and decided to come back with family.
perfect place to relax, chill and refresh.
Very expensive but as compared to the set up and options is very minimal and real value for money.
Food is average not great tried Chinese it was not at all good and very salty left without having it.

tripreview.Title: "wonder wonder la"
tripreview.sentence: i loved everything especially the wave pool and cinemax.
I enjoyed the wonder splash and the pirate ship.
We spend lot of time in the family pool.
I will never forget the experience.
Thank you wonderla!
I will come again.

tripreview.Title: "Fun time with family"
tripreview.sentence: We had a great time in this amusement park with family in May 2014, spent a day here from `11am to 5 pm.
Located at the outskirts of the city, it took us more than an hour to reach from Jose junction , a mere 25 km , due to heavy traffic blocks.
One needs to hire a taxi [ Rs 1200 to 1600 two way] as public transport is cumbersome and tiring.
Park has lots of dry rides as well as wet rides for kids and adults alike.
A word of caution - huge crowds during public holidays leading to long ques for most of the rides.

tripreview.Title: "really excellent"
tripreview.sentence: this was my third visit really excellent .
every one should go.
new rides are really entertainment.

tripreview.Title: "Absolutely WONDERful....."
tripreview.sentence: We had been to wonderla in a group of 5 adults and 4 kids to have our first experience there.
It turned out to be a WONDERLA day full of amusement.
The park is bit on the outskirt of the city and on a hilly terrain which is beutifully contained in the landscspe design.
Every kind of rides are positioned at its best siutable location.
As we entered into wonderla best impression was about its cleanliness as compared to other parks in the country.
Whether the quality of water in the pool or ambience of food outlets etc all were top notch.
The best technological innovation I observed there was usage of wearable electronic wallet which can be preloaded with money thus can be used inside the park where payment of money is called for.
The electronic wallet is waterproof and you are absolutely free to jump into the pool wearing it.
We mostly enjoyed water rides and spend most of the time in wave pool.
Our kids were not at all coming out of it.
There is scope for all age groups to enjoy the visit.
Photography is banned there and is indeed a welcome move.
Trying dry rides first is advisable as you may not get entry into some of them if you are wet.
Of course there are well managed locker system, changerooms etc.
Advise to come with a pair of active wear as it will be more safe as well as convenient.
As we came out of WONDERLA we couldn't imagine how the day was spent and also decided to have another trip for sure.
A must visit to everybody on a visit to KOCHI -"The Queen of Arabian Sea".

tripreview.Title: "awesome place"
tripreview.sentence: Wonderla is a great day out, plenty to do for all the family.
There are both wet and dry rides.
Park is very clean, plenty of storage facilities, toilets, changing rooms etc.
Very reasonably priced.
Plenty of staff on all rides for assistance or even just a bit a reassurance.
Only down side was the pools became a bit too crowded at certain times of the day.
Looking forward to visiting again soon.

tripreview.Title: "Nice Amusement place"
tripreview.sentence: The wonderla is too good.
Kids enjoyed.
We had amazing experience especially the water splash, wow

tripreview.Title: "For a funfilled day in Cochin"
tripreview.sentence: Wonderla is always an attraction to all kind of holiday makers in Cochin.
The choices of rides are many and there is no place nearby to compare to the same.
Some of the rides are really spine chilling and thrilling.
The only negative is you need to wait for a long time to get into rides as there is always a long queue.
